name: Beton
instructions:
1. Add ingredients to a highball glass with ice.
2. Garnish with a lemon slice.
description: The Beton is a Czech cocktail starring Becherovka, an herbal liqueur, and tonic water, that is sometimes compared to a Gin and Tonic.

ingredients.name: Tonic
ingredients.description: Tonic water is a carbonated beverage that is flavored with quinine, a bitter compound derived from the bark of the cinchona tree. Originally used as a prophylactic against malaria due to its quinine content, tonic water has evolved into a popular mixer for various cocktails, especially the classic Gin and Tonic.

ingredients.name: Becherovka
ingredients.description:
Becherovka (Czech pronunciation: [ˈbɛxɛˌrofka]), formerly Karlsbader Becherbitter, is a herbal bitters, often drunk as a digestif. It is produced in Karlovy Vary, Czech Republic by the Jan Becher company. The brand is owned by Pernod Ricard. It is made from a secret recipe based on more than twenty types of herbs and spices.

Becherovka is often described as having a gingery or cinnamon flavor.
